description: Deep within an abandoned dig site, there lies ancient tablets that hold information about the Dark Serpent.
Drums of war echoes trough the land as Jae-sungs forces leave behing a trail of destruction.
The travel to the city of Gita is dangerious and full of terrors.
Its not easy to get people out of prison and sometimes its even harder to get in.
As the sun is setting, its last beams of light shine their glow upon the bodies of these captives.
Drums of war echoes trough the land as the horrors of war rise from the shadows.
